content.description: The next questions refer to the 1950 poster, shown below, created by the French Communist Party.
content.question: The attitude exemplified by the poster was likely LEAST influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: Soviet influence over Western European communist parties during the Cold War
The creation of the United Nations

content.answer: The creation of the United Nations

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
